name: Peryton University
summary:
In Peryton University you play as Phim, a socially anxious and struggling to fit in freshman at Peryton University, and the dorm you are living in is hosting a house party in which you don’t know anyone. 
 
In Peryton University, Phim must take small steps towards tackling his social anxiety by interacting with people and collecting social cards to play when talking to other party goers. The goal is to collect all social cards and have the confidence to approach an estranged friend who is also attending the party.
